name: MSS, Incorporated
description:
LUDUM DARE 46 ENTRY - RATE THE GAME HERE:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/mss-incorporated

You wake up and don’t remember a thing. Who are you? Where are you? Who is the mysterious voice that keeps on talking to you? Why are these… robots attacking a main server?

Grab your katana sword, smash through incoming robots and discover terrifying truth about you and MSS, Incorporated!

HOW TO PLAY?

Click left mouse button to hit enemy with katana. Click right mouse button to use special dash ability that reloads every 3 seconds. Robots damage main server every 3 seconds. After 100 hits, the server will be destroyed.

If you want to talk to The Voice or get more information walk right to the green console and hit spacebar. Remember - the game cannot be paused, so the server will continue to be damaged by robots while you’re using the console.

The game is quite short and has two main endings (and a server death screen), so we highly encourage you to replay it and unblock both endings. :)

GAME WAS MADE BY:

  • CEELMAH @Mordechai - programming
  • CYGI @Cygi - music, special effect and cutscenes
  • THOMASWARD @thomasward - story, script and creative decisions
  • JONEK @iasha - UI and some graphics

SPECIAL THANKS TO:

  • supertrain - for dialogue proofreading
  • Ozzzim - for making a graphic we’ve never used (thanks anyway :)
  • Igor - for making some miscellaneous graphics

WARNING: In an update, we fixed two critical game bugs (which is okay by the jam rules).
